# ML Extensions - Project Context

## Project Purpose
Building a professional website to showcase and sell SketchUp extensions for architects and designers.

## Current Extensions
- **ML Kitchens** - Advanced kitchen design automation tools
- **ML Doors** - Comprehensive door and window library  
- **Future extensions** - ML Bathrooms, ML Furniture, etc.

## Technology Stack
- React 18 + Vite 5 for fast development and building
- Tailwind CSS for styling with custom design system
- Gumroad for e-commerce and digital product delivery
- Playwright for testing user flows and visual regression
- Context7 MCP for up-to-date documentation access

## Target Audience
### Primary: Professional Architects
- Pain points: Time constraints, repetitive modeling tasks
- Goals: Efficiency, professional results, client satisfaction
- Language: Professional, ROI-focused, time-saving benefits

### Secondary: Interior Designers
- Pain points: Complex visualizations, client communication
- Goals: Beautiful results, style consistency, workflow efficiency
- Language: Creative, aesthetic-focused, design-oriented

### Tertiary: Contractors & Builders  
- Pain points: Accuracy, material estimation, cost control
- Goals: Precise measurements, faster quotes, error reduction
- Language: Practical, straightforward, value-focused

## Business Model
- One-time purchases ($19.99 - $29.99 per extension)
- Instant digital delivery through Gumroad
- 30-day money-back guarantee
- Email support and video tutorials included

## Key Success Metrics
- Conversion rate: Product page visits â†’ purchases
- Average order value across extensions
- Customer lifetime value (multiple extension purchases)
- Support ticket reduction through better documentation

## Brand Voice & Positioning
- **Professional but approachable** - Expert guidance without intimidation
- **Efficiency-focused** - Always emphasize time savings and productivity  
- **Results-oriented** - Show real value and ROI for users
- **Trustworthy** - Guarantee, testimonials, professional presentation
